alert.note: Alert for Alcorn (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 5:28PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Tippah and Alcorn Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 528 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Theo, or 13 miles southwest of Corinth, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Corinth, Hinkle, Theo, Guys, Rienzi, Kossuth, Allentown, Hightown, Collinstown, Wenasoga, Biggersville, Crumtown, Jobes and Gift. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
